In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the **double quotation mark** symbol (**"**) serves the following purposes:

- In the dungeon, a " can represent an [amulet](/wiki/Amulet "Amulet") or a [web](/wiki/Web "Web"). If playing with colors, amulets are usually colored (") while webs are white/gray (").
- Press ["]() to view your currently worn amulet (if any).

## Variants

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") introduces the [neutral outsider](/wiki/Neutral_outsider "Neutral outsider") [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class"), which uses the " glyph and consists of the following monsters:

- [Kamerel](/wiki/Kamerel "Kamerel"):

  - " [Amm Kamerel](/wiki/Amm_Kamerel "Amm Kamerel")
  - " [Hudor Kamerel](/wiki/Hudor_Kamerel "Hudor Kamerel")
  - " [Sharab Kamerel](/wiki/Sharab_Kamerel "Sharab Kamerel")
  - " [Ara Kamerel](/wiki/Ara_Kamerel "Ara Kamerel")

- [Rilmani](/wiki/Rilmani "Rilmani"):

  - " [Plumach Rilmani](/wiki/Plumach_Rilmani "Plumach Rilmani")

  - " [Ferrumach Rilmani](/wiki/Ferrumach_Rilmani "Ferrumach Rilmani")

  - " [Cuprilach Rilmani](/wiki/Cuprilach_Rilmani "Cuprilach Rilmani")

  - " [Stannumach Rilmani](/wiki/Stannumach_Rilmani "Stannumach Rilmani")

  - " [Argenach Rilmani](/wiki/Argenach_Rilmani "Argenach Rilmani")

  - " [Hydrargyrumach Rilmani](/wiki/Hydrargyrumach_Rilmani "Hydrargyrumach Rilmani")

    - " [mercurial essence](/wiki/Mercurial_essence "Mercurial essence")
    - " [brimstone essence](/wiki/Brimstone_essence "Brimstone essence")

  - " [Aurumach Rilmani](/wiki/Aurumach_Rilmani "Aurumach Rilmani")

  - " [Center of All](/wiki/Center_of_All "Center of All")

- " [Adamach](/wiki/Adamach "Adamach")

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")

Printable ASCII characters
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + space
` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = { } |
Qq Ww Ee Rr Tt Yy Uu Ii Oo Pp : " [ ] \
Aa Ss Dd Ff Gg Hh Jj Kk Ll ? ; ' Ctrl
Zz Xx Cc Vv Bb Nn Mm , . / < > Alt

In NetHack, the double quotation mark symbol (") serves the following purposes:

  • In the dungeon, a " can represent an amulet or a web. If playing with colors, amulets are usually colored (") while webs are white/gray (").
  • Press " to view your currently worn amulet (if any).

Variants

dNetHack

dNetHack introduces the neutral outsider monster class, which uses the " glyph and consists of the following monsters:

  • Kamerel:
    • " Amm Kamerel
    • " Hudor Kamerel
    • " Sharab Kamerel
    • " Ara Kamerel
  • Rilmani:
    • " Plumach Rilmani
    • " Ferrumach Rilmani
    • " Cuprilach Rilmani
    • " Stannumach Rilmani
    • " Argenach Rilmani
    • " Hydrargyrumach Rilmani
      • " mercurial essence
      • " brimstone essence
    • " Aurumach Rilmani
    • " Center of All
  • " Adamach

rawPage:
{{ASCII}}
In ''[[NetHack]]'', the '''double quotation mark''' symbol ('''"''') serves the following purposes:

* In the dungeon, a {{white|"}} can represent an [[amulet]] or a [[web]]. If playing with colors, amulets are usually colored ({{cyan|"}}) while webs are white/gray ({{white|"}}).
* Press {{kbd|"}} to view your currently worn amulet (if any).

==Variants==
===dNetHack===
[[dNetHack]] introduces the [[neutral outsider]] [[monster class]], which uses the {{white|"}} glyph and consists of the following monsters:

* [[Kamerel]]:
** {{gray|"}} [[Amm Kamerel]]
** {{blue|"}} [[Hudor Kamerel]]
** {{brown|"}} [[Sharab Kamerel]]
** {{yellow|"}} [[Ara Kamerel]]
* [[Rilmani]]:
** {{black|"}} [[Plumach Rilmani]]
** {{red|"}} [[Ferrumach Rilmani]]
** {{orange|"}} [[Cuprilach Rilmani]]
** {{white|"}} [[Stannumach Rilmani]]
** {{white|"}} [[Argenach Rilmani]]
** {{orange|"}} [[Hydrargyrumach Rilmani]]
*** {{gray|"}} [[mercurial essence]]
*** {{yellow|"}} [[brimstone essence]]
** {{yellow|"}} [[Aurumach Rilmani]]
** {{magenta|"}} [[Center of All]]
* {{magenta|"}} [[Adamach]]
{{nethack-367}}
[[Category:ASCII]]
